entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 22 April 2023
